subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In a precursor to a dreadful evening, Pedro Martínez allowed four runs in the first inning, prompting even the folks wearing "Vote for Pedro" T-shirts and waving signs reading, "Welcome Back Pay-dro" to stomp and cheer.
snippet: In a precursor to a dreadful evening, Pedro Martínez allowed four runs in the first inning, prompting even the folks wearing "Vote for Pedro" T-shirts and waving signs reading, "Welcome Back Pay-dro" to stomp and cheer.
